alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 24 at 5:02PM CDT until October 24 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL MONROE COUNTY... At 502 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Sparta, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Tomah around 515 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include St Marys, Jackson Pass, Wilton, Clifton, Tunnel City, Highway 131 And County A, and Norwalk. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 between mile markers 139 and 147. Interstate 90/94 between mile markers 46 and 48. Interstate 90 in Wisconsin between mile markers 30 and 45. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
